title: "Oxfordshire self-driving single-decker bus begins operating"
excerpt: "An electric self-driving full-size single-decker bus has began operating for the first time. The Mi-Link 003 service, operated by First Bus, is carrying passengers in Oxfordshire between Didcot Parkway train station and Milton Park."
